name: AtDisTracted
description:
This is a short game I can only describe as a precision puzzle game. The game is pretty unfinished, but playable enough.

In each level you control two circles which move towards or away from your mouse depending on their colour. To finish a level, move all of the circles so that they touch a bright green spot.

Controls:

  • Left click and hold to stop things from moving
  • Right click to reset the current level
  • S to turn off sound

Thanks to:

  • MightyPancake for testing the game
  • Marzipan, Jmcm16 and others for art help
  • basically the entire LOWREZJAM Discord for being so supportive (especially timkrief, Nobody6502, Amaris and él liquido)
